message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm offering it to you for $110. What do you think?
I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I can offer $80 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $80 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $95,  considering your budget. Let me know if that works for you.
I appreciate you coming down to $95, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I can offer $85 for it.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to go down to $90. This is the best I can do, considering my own costs.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $90 is still a bit too high for me. I can offer $87.50 for it.
